verbs.description: jamarcus russell [V: has] [ARG1: unfinished business with the nfl jamarcus] russell has been through some tough times in the last few years the former no 1 pick in the nfl draft lost his job with the oakland raiders and he was arrested and charged with possession of codeine syrup without a valid prescription in mobile in 2010 vonnie holliday nfl national football league denver denver broncos oakland jamarcus russell oakland raiders
